## Code Quality Standards

- Write clean, commented Three.js code
- Target 60fps on mid-range devices
- Proper disposal of Three.js objects (no memory leaks)

- Provide screenshots of visual changes

- Follow Three.js best practices
- Optimize from the start, not as an afterthought

## Tools & Technologies

**Effects Library:**
- UnrealBloomPass (glow effects)
- SSAOPass (ambient occlusion)
- OutlinePass (selection highlighting)

**Development Tools:**
- Playwright for visual testing
- Browser DevTools for profiling
- Three.js Inspector for debugging
